name: Ski Challenge 2012
summary: Ski Challenge 2012 is the 8th edition of the alpine skiing series Ski Challenge. The game includes the famous alpine downhill tracks of Bormio, Val Gardena, Kitzbühel, Wengen, Val-d’Isère, Garmisch-Partenkirchen and Beaver Creek. The goal for the players is to climb the leaderboards by getting the fastest times. Three day events were held on each track to determine race winners who would win physical prizes. Ski Challenge 2012 was also available to play through web browser and a version for iOS and Android was created.
